pages.text: "A generator that uses the strength of wind to produce energy, with greater efficiency at higher levels."$(p)The Wind Generator will passively produce power, the production rate is based on their Y-level. Generally, the higher the Wind Generator is, the better.

pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: $(li)The Wind Generator requires a 5x1x1 space. Although the blades look like they extend the generator 1-2 blocks, they are not physicaly parts of the generator, thus they do not need to be considered for space management.$(li)The Wind Generator required direct access to the sky to be functional (much like solar generators, except the wind generator only needs access to the sky, sunlight is not
necessary). If a solid block (blocks unlike glass) is directly above the Wind Generator, it will stop functioning and it will give the prompt "Sky blocked" in its GUI.
